headline: Traffic anomalies and notifications with Cloudflare Radar
keywords: Birthday Week, Cloudflare Radar, Outage, BGP, Internet Traffic, Notifications
description: Cloudflare Radar now displays country and ASN traffic anomalies in the Outage Center as they are detected, as well as publishing anomaly information via API. We are also launching Radar notifications, enabling users to subscribe to notifications about traffic anomalies
